translations: aux.已经（用于过去完成时态）
v.有；吃，喝，抽（烟）；患病，得病（have 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: They had used what money they had.
We had walked further than I had realized.
sentences.translation: 在我不知不觉中我们已走得很远。

sentences.sentence: They had had their pet dog stuffed.
sentences.translation: 他们请人把他们的宠物狗制成了标本。
